<header className="header" sx={{ ...headerStyles }}>
  <Container className="container">
    {search && (
      <SearchForm
        sx={{
          width: [`100%`, `100%`, `33%`],
           display: `flex`,
            justifyContent: [`center`, `center`, `flex-start`],
          }}
        />
     )}
     <SiteBranding
       title={title}
       sx={{
         width: [`50%`, `50%`, `33%`],
          display: `flex`,
           ...styles,
       }}
     />
  </Container>
</header>
